div.p:
Online user 1:
But what if you have a high tolerance?

Online user 2:
If you have a higher tolerance, than it takes more alcohol to become impaired.

Online user 3:
Right--like me. I have a higher tolerance, doesn't that mean I should be able to drink more than other people without having a problem?

Antonio:
All good questions. It does seem like people with a high tolerance can drink more than others without having problems. We’re going to see if that’s true, but first we need a clear understanding of how tolerance works.
